## Sky High Spyder / Sky High Spy Remake
* **PLATFORM**: Windows
* **LANGUAGE**: C++
* **ENVIRONMENT**: Visual Studio
  
<br>
This is my attempt to recreate Sky High Spy game during Sumo Digital internship.
